15.description: Duarte uses Holden as both a prisoner and an advisor, valuing his insights while keeping him captive as a political tool.

recaps.1: Thirteen years after Laconian conquest, Naomi leads the underground resistance while searching for ways to rescue the imprisoned James Holden.
recaps.2: Dr. Elvi Okoye studies dangerous phenomena in the ring gates while serving as a scientist in the Laconian Empire.
recaps.3: James Holden remains imprisoned on Laconia, serving as both a political prisoner and reluctant advisor to High Consul Duarte.
recaps.4: Teresa Duarte struggles with being heir to an empire built on conquest while witnessing her father's increasing obsession with alien technology.
recaps.5: Bobbie Draper and Alex Kamal continue resistance operations despite their advancing age and declining health.
recaps.6: Colonel Tanaka hunts resistance networks while becoming disturbed by Duarte's alien transformation and its implications for the empire.
recaps.7: Winston Duarte's alien enhancements grant him incredible abilities but threaten to fundamentally change his nature and priorities.
recaps.8: Teresa watches her father become increasingly inhuman as his alien modifications progress and his obsessions deepen.
recaps.9: Amos Burton and Clarissa Mao support resistance operations while dealing with the physical limitations and health crises of advanced age.
recaps.10: Elvi discovers increasingly dangerous anomalies in ring space that threaten all human transportation through the gate network.
recaps.11: Admiral Trejo questions whether Duarte's transformation serves the empire's best interests or threatens its destruction.
recaps.12: Young resistance fighters like Kit train with aging veterans, preparing to inherit the fight against Laconian rule.
recaps.13: The aging Rocinante crew continues their fight against impossible odds while preparing the next generation for leadership.
recaps.14: Scientific research reveals that ring gate anomalies are connected to ancient alien responses to human activities.
recaps.15: Duarte uses Holden as both prisoner and advisor while pursuing his obsession with unlocking alien technological secrets.
recaps.16: Teresa realizes her father may no longer be capable of human reasoning or emotional connection as his transformation accelerates.
recaps.17: Naomi coordinates resistance operations across multiple systems while developing new technologies to counter Laconian advantages.
recaps.18: Laconian scientists like Dr. Kasik work with Elvi on ring gate research, growing concerned about the dangerous phenomena they discover.
recaps.19: Military leaders face difficult decisions about loyalty to an increasingly alien emperor versus protecting the empire and its people.
recaps.20: Next generation fighters learn advanced resistance techniques while preparing for greater responsibilities as older fighters retire.
recaps.21: Bobbie leads dangerous missions against Laconian installations while training younger resistance fighters in combat tactics.
recaps.22: Intelligence officers become increasingly disturbed by their emperor's transformation and what it means for the empire's future.
recaps.23: Duarte's alien modifications provide godlike abilities but threaten to completely separate him from human concerns and emotions.
recaps.24: Imperial administrators struggle to govern an empire while their leader becomes increasingly focused on alien obsessions.
recaps.25: Aging resistance members face their mortality while trying to contribute meaningfully to the cause before they die.
recaps.26: Research teams work desperately to understand ring gate dangers before they trigger catastrophic responses from ancient alien systems.
recaps.27: High-ranking military officers confront the possibility that their loyalty to Duarte conflicts with protecting the people they serve.
recaps.28: Young fighters develop into leaders while learning that the resistance must continue beyond the current generation of veterans.
recaps.29: Alex faces a medical crisis that threatens his ability to continue piloting and supporting critical resistance operations.
recaps.30: Elvi works desperately to understand the ancient alien threat that Duarte's actions are awakening across the ring systems.
recaps.31: Duarte's pursuit of alien technology threatens to trigger responses that could destroy human civilization across all systems.
recaps.32: Teresa faces the reality that her father has lost his humanity and may no longer be capable of ruling responsibly.
recaps.33: Resistance leaders face aging and mortality while preparing successors to continue the fight for freedom from Laconian rule.
recaps.34: Scientific discoveries reveal the full scope of the ancient alien threat posed by continued human expansion through the rings.
recaps.35: Holden becomes involved in the crisis surrounding Duarte's transformation and the awakening of ancient alien defenses.
recaps.36: Next generation fighters take on increasing responsibilities as the founding members of the resistance face their limitations.
recaps.37: Bobbie prepares for what may be her final mission while ensuring her tactical knowledge passes to younger fighters.
recaps.38: Intelligence operations reveal the growing instability of the empire as Duarte's transformation alienates his own supporters.
recaps.39: Duarte becomes obsessed with unlocking alien potential at the potential cost of human civilization and his own humanity.
recaps.40: Administrative chaos grows as the emperor becomes less capable of human decision-making while pursuing alien transformation.
recaps.41: Dying resistance members struggle to make final contributions while watching younger fighters prepare to inherit their mission.
recaps.42: Scientific research reaches critical conclusions about the existential threat posed by continued human use of alien technology.
recaps.43: Military leaders face the ultimate test of loyalty as they decide whether to support or oppose their transforming emperor.
recaps.44: Young leaders step forward to take control of resistance operations as the founding generation reaches the end of their effectiveness.
recaps.45: Final missions for aging fighters become critical tests for the next generation who must carry on their legacy.
recaps.46: Intelligence networks face collapse as the empire's stability crumbles under the weight of Duarte's alien transformation.
recaps.47: Duarte's pursuit of godlike power reaches its climax, threatening the existence of human civilization across all ring systems.
recaps.48: Teresa must decide whether to continue her father's path or forge a completely different future for humanity and the empire.
recaps.49: The resistance faces its final test as both empire and rebellion confront the consequences of awakened alien defenses.
recaps.50: Scientific understanding reaches its conclusion as the true nature of the ancient alien threat becomes undeniably clear.
recaps.51: Military and political leaders make ultimate decisions about humanity's future as the crisis reaches its breaking point.
recaps.52: The next generation inherits responsibility for humanity's survival as their mentors face the consequences of their lifelong struggle.
recaps.53: The conclusion of Duarte's transformation and the resistance's evolution sets the stage for humanity's final confrontation with ancient powers.
